nodes.text: The High Council Tower was one of the four towers surrounding the Temple Spire atop the Jedi Temple on Coruscant. It most notably housed the meeting place of the Jedi High Council, which had overall decision-making powers over the Jedi Order. The tower also contained a room with a large holomap of the galaxy, which was surrounded around its circumference by a balcony with three Contemplation Stations.
